GS7S est une structure conçue pour inter: GS7S is a structure designed to intervene primarily in the defense and security sector in Africa. Favoring a global and systemic approach, GS7Solutions is committed to providing priority support to military and paramilitary organizations responsible for directly ensuring the security of populations. .Taking into consideration the globality of security concerns and the diversity of actors placed at all levels (from high-level decision-makers to front-line soldiers), GS7S also aims to contribute to strengthening the skills of elites and civil organizations in matters of security. defense and security.Read more

GS7S ambitionne de se positionner comme: GS7S aims to position itself as a reference structure, recognized for its efficient contribution in the search for peace and security in Africa through its strategic studies and the support it provides to the various security actors, including the African Defence and Security Forces.
En vue de contribuer à la recherche et a: In order to contribute to the research and strengthening of peace and security in Africa, GS7S aims to :
Contribuer au développement de la pensée: Contribute to the development of African strategic thinking
Contribuer au renforcement de l’esprit D: Contribute to strengthening the Defence & Security spirit among African decision-makers and civil society
Contribuer au développement de l’esprit: Contribute to the development of peace and security among young Africans
Soutenir les forces de défense et de séc: Support African defence and security forces (SDF) with appropriate advice and solutions
Contribuer à la satisfaction des besoins: Contribute to the satisfaction of the security needs of organizations, companies and investors who express the need
Favoriser le transfert de l’expertise mi: Promote the transfer of military expertise in the civilian environment
GS7S est le fruit d’un ensemble de renco: GS7S is the result of a series of meetings and rich exchanges between actors from various African countries, all concerned with the security challenges that hinder the development of the continent.
Zambakro (Cote d’Ivoire) : Le Colonel Ab: Zambakro (Ivory Coast): Colonel Abou Oumarou (Niger) J3 OPS of the General Staff of the MICECI shares with a group of African officers whose J5 Plan (Lt Colonel Seyni Cissé Diop of Senegal) the idea of the creation of a group or cabinet of African military experts committed to the promotion of the security in Africa.
Niamey (Niger) : Retrouvailles à Niamey: Niamey (Niger): Reunion in Niamey between Colonel Seyni Cissé Diop and Colonel Abou Oumarou (Niger). They again discussed issues of defence and security in Africa
Dakar (Sénégal) : Débutconceptualisation: Dakar (Senegal): Conceptualization of the military expert firm
Dakar : Immatriculation de la société Gl: Dakar: Registration of Global System 7 Solutions
lancement des activités de GS7 présidé p: launch of GS7 activities chaired by General Lamine Cisse
Kisangani (Rép Démocratique du Congo) :: Kisangani (Democratic Republic of the Congo): At the proposal of Colonel Seyni Cissé Diop, Commander of Operational Sector 2 of MONUSCO, Colonel Abdou Diallo (Burkina Faso) and Warrant Officer Major Talla Ndiaye (Senegal) participate in a meeting focused on the creation of a group of military experts capable of proposing solutions to the African Defence and Security Forces. At the end of the meeting, the outlines of a cabinet in defense and security were drawn.
GS7S est une structure conçue pour inter: GS7S is a structure designed to intervene mainly in the defence and security sector in Africa
Privilégiant une approche globale et sys: Favouring a global and systemic approach, GS7Solutions participates in strategic research and is also committed to supporting military and paramilitary organizations directly responsible for ensuring the security of populations.
Par des conseils adaptés et des solution: Through appropriate advice and solutions, GS7S aims to contribute as a priority to the capacity building and skills of the African Defence and Security Forces
Prenant en considération la globalité de: Taking into account the global security concerns and the diversity of actors at all levels (from high-level decision-makers to soldiers on the front line), GS7S also aims to contribute to the strengthening of the skills of elites and civil organizations in defence and security.
Se positionnant entre les structures de: Positioning themselves between the structures of reflection and decision-making, and the organizations in direct charge of the security of the populations, GS7S aims above all to be identified as a reference company committed to the search for peace and security through its support to the various actors and its contributions.
Ainsi, GS7S interviendra sur 3 dimension: Thus, GS7S will operate on three dimensions:
La Recherche et l’analyse de la situatio: Research and analysis of the local and international security situation with a view to contributing positively to policy-making and security decision-making, as a Think Tank.
Le renforcement des compétences en matiè: The strengthening of defence and security skills through organisational advice and training or skill-building for well-targeted groups, both civilian, military and paramilitary. These targeted groups include the Defence and Security Forces (military and paramilitary), parliamentarians, local elected officials, senior authorities, executives, decision-makers, investors, operational personnel, women and men in direct contact.
L’appui aux FDS africaines et aux entrep: Support to African SDSs and companies in the fields of human resources, logistics, equipment, computing and information systems to strengthen their potential and intervention capacities.
Les activités répertoriées au sein de ce: The activities listed within these three (3) axes will be led by experienced and very high-level consultants. In carrying out their mission, they will share their expertise with specialized consultants and external stakeholders. In addition, GS7S intends to highlight the fresh spirit of young graduates who will benefit from the guidance of senior pilots in the areas of competence of GS7S listed below:
Le Directeur Général , Colonel (Cr) Seyn: The Director General , Colonel (Cr) Seyni Cissé Diop is a reserve parachute officer of the Senegalese Army who has 40 years of military service experience including more than 10 spent abroad as part of his training and peacekeeping operations. A graduate of the Institute of Advanced Defense Studies in Rome and a graduate of the Ecole Supérieure de Guerre, he is a Master 2 in Advanced Security Studies, a Master in Strategic Military Studies and a Master 2/DESS in Human Resources Management. He is fluent in Wolof, French, English, Italian, and understands Kiswahili.
Des cadres de haut niveau bénéficiant d’: High-level executives with solid experience gained during their service in the Defence and Security Forces
Des experts, femmes et hommes maitrisant: Experts, women and men mastering their field of competence
Des jeunes chercheurs fortement imprégné: Young researchers deeply immersed in the security problems of Africa and the world
Un réseau de consultants et de correspon: A network of African and international consultants and correspondents

Les consultants pilotes de domaine condu: The Domain Pilot Consultants will carry out all activities related to their area of competence and consequently ensure permanent liaison with clients throughout the duration of the missions entrusted to them.
Les consultants spécialisés travailleron: The specialized consultants will each work in their area of expertise, in perfect synergy with the domain pilots and junior consultants.
GS7S encourage la participation de jeune: GS7S encourages the participation of young graduates who, supervised by seniors, will benefit from their solid experience while bringing a clear added value to GS7S.
GS7S dispose de personnes ressources exp: GS7S has expert resource persons who intervene when needed.
Par ailleurs, un réseau de correspondant: In addition, a network of national and international correspondents will contribute continuously to GS7S publications, which will also be able to call on their skills for any activity that will require their direct involvement.
